pullRequest.title: Flattening Deeply Nested Data (KSQL)
pullRequest.bodyText:
This tutorial showcase how to handle records containing nested data (also known as sub-fields or complex data structures) and turn the data into a flatten version of the record.
This PR addresses the following issue: #190
Sincerely,
-- Ricardo

commit.message: Fixed the narrative to something more palatable
